help.text:
Members of ${channel} have access to a private Google Drive.
Invite other members into this channel to give them access!

attachments.title: Directions
attachments.text:
Use the `/${cmd}` command in any channel.
`/${cmd} help` will show this message.
`/${cmd} link` will fetch the link to Google Drive.

attachments.title: Caveats
attachments.text: This tool works best if the email you used to sign up for Slack is the same as the one you use for Google Drive.
